column4: i need to know whats the different with ubuntu 32bit and 64bit. I got AMD turion 64x2 in my laptop. Why in the ubuntu download page 64bit in not recommended for daily desktop usage?
personally i think the "not recommended" on the web site is a bug - and look it's already filed as one ;)  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-website-content/+bug/585940
thank you. I will safe-upgrade my system. regarding ubuntu maverik can we upgrade current system using the dvd version? how?
